title: “Game On 2022” National Sales Conference
body_lines: Ceylon Agro Industries recognizes top sales achievers of the year

Ceylon Agro Industries Ltd – Pima Group Sri Lanka held its Annual National Sales Conference 2022 at Waters Edge recently, with the participation of over 350 members of CAI’s (Pima Group Sri Lanka) dynamic sales force.

The primary focus of the conference was to recognize top sales achievers of 2021. Today, Prima is a household brand that has won an enormous share of consumers’ love and trust by selling some of the most popular consumer brands such as Prima KottuMee, Prima Stella, Prima Sunrise, Prima Treats, Prima Flour, and many more.

Gracing the occasion, Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima Group Sri Lanka) Group General Manager Mr. Lawrence Chan shared: “I would like to express my deep appreciation for all your hard work; the effort you’ve collectively put as a team over the past two years to reach every household of Sri Lanka is truly remarkable.”

Speaking at the conference, Ceylon Agro Industries (Prima group Sri Lanka) General Manager Mr. Shun Tien Shing shared: “In spite of all the challenges of recent times, you have kept your focus on company objectives as well as brand sales targets. The success we see today is a result of your unwavering commitment and passion. It is this same commitment and passion that has made Prima a brand loved by all.”
